title: Wizard Works Announces the Snagla Waterproof Hip and Bar Bag
content:
Wizard Works announces the launch of Snagla, a new 3.5L waterproof hip pack that effortlessly converts to a bar bag – the ultimate two-in-one bag for both on and off the bike adventures. Designed in response to the current economic conditions and leveraging the company’s newly acquired seam taping technology, Snagla offers exceptional versatility without compromising on performance or durability.

Snagla Hip Pack Quick Hits

  • MSRP: £120 / €140 / $173
  • Size: 15-22h x 26w x 7.5d cm | Belt fits up to 55” / 140cm
  • Volume: 3.5L
  • Weight: 310g
  • Colours: Black, Olive, Tan ready to buy. Or go Custom for the bag of your dreams

Following the purchase of a seam taping machine last year, Wizard Works has embarked on an ambitious journey to waterproof their entire product range. While some existing bags required minimal modifications, hip packs presented a unique challenge that demanded reimagining. The Snagla design draws inspiration from a convertible hip pack bar bag that Wizard Works originally created for Pannier.cc way back in 2021, this existing design served as an ideal foundation for implementing a floating, therefore seam-tapeable, liner.

“It’s very hard to compete in price with bags produced overseas, given that we make in London and pay our staff the London Living Wage or above, but we’re committed to back our price tag up with an exceptionally high-quality product – it was that sentiment that really fuelled our waterproofing journey.” Veronica Lowe

Snagla features a plush padded back panel made with UK made 9mm spacer mesh for all day comfort, with the main buckle located on the wide padded wing to prevent discomfort during rides. The bag is compatible with up to two Quick Draw Bottle Pockets (sold separately and only compatible in hip pack mode), while tensioning straps pull the bag snug against the body for stability on challenging terrain.
The roll-top closure offers expandable storage, and a quick-attaching Fidlock Hook Buckle ensures secure, one-handed operation. Snagla includes a floating, seam-taped liner that provides waterproof protection, and two interior mesh drop pocket helps organize smaller items. With the 3.5L capacity Snagla provides ample storage for all day adventuring.

Recognizing that not all customers require bar bag functionality, Wizard Works offers the bar bag conversion kit as an optional add-on, allowing customers to purchase only the features they need. For bar bag mode, the hip pack wings tuck discreetly into the back panel, and the bag attaches to the bars via daisy chain webbing on the rear.

Named in keeping with Wizard Works’ goblin fantasy-themed wearable range, Snagla represents the company’s commitment to made in London cycling accessories that deliver exceptional quality and performance.

Available in 3 stock colours, Black, Olive and Tan, or made to order in your choice of materials, the Snagla Hip Pack + Bar Bag is available from Wizard Works and selected dealers today.
